Bash(git tag -a v0.1.0-foundation -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Release v0.1.0-foundation: HQT Trading System Foundation Layer

This release marks the completion of Phase 1: Foundation Layer
infrastructure for the HQT Trading System.

## Completed Components

### 1. Exception Handling System
- Hierarchical exception classes \(HQTBaseError → domain exceptions\)
- Error codes and module tracking
- Support for additional context and related exceptions
- 100% test coverage

### 2. Logging System  
- Structured logging with JSON/text formatters
- Log redaction for sensitive data \(API keys, passwords\)
- Performance tracking and context filters
- Multiple handlers \(console, file, rotating\)
- 71-96% test coverage

### 3. Configuration Management
- TOML-based configuration \(base + environment overlays\)
- Pydantic v2 validation with type safety
- Secrets management via OS keyring integration
- Environment variable substitution
- 49-83% test coverage

### 4. Utility Functions
- Date/time utilities: Market hours, timezone handling, bar alignment
- Validation: Symbol, volume, price validation with Decimal precision
- Calculations: Pip value, position sizing, Kelly criterion, Sharpe ratio
- Helpers: Deep merge, file hashing, UUID generation
- 68-91% test coverage

### 5. Database Layer \(SQLAlchemy 2.x\)
- DatabaseManager with connection pooling \(SQLite + PostgreSQL\)
- 15 ORM models with Mapped[] type annotations
- Repository pattern with generic BaseRepository[T]
- 7 specialized repositories for CRUD operations
- Cascade deletes for referential integrity
- 90-99% test coverage

### 6. Development Tools
- Automated setup script \(scripts/setup_dev.py\)
- Comprehensive unit tests \(172 tests\)
- Integration test suite \(1 comprehensive test\)
- HTML coverage reports

## Test Results
- **173 tests passing**
- **87% overall coverage** \(exceeds 85% target\)
- Database layer: 90-99% coverage
- Exception handling: 71-100% coverage
- Utilities: 68-91% coverage

## Phase 1 Tasks Completed
- ✅ Task 1.1: Exception Handling
- ✅ Task 1.2: Logging System  
- ✅ Task 1.3: Configuration Management
- ✅ Task 1.4: Testing Infrastructure
- ✅ Task 1.5: Configuration Files
- ✅ Task 1.6: Utility Functions
- ✅ Task 1.7: Database Layer \(core\)
- ✅ Task 1.8: Integration & Validation

## Deferred to Phase 2
- Alembic migrations \(schema will stabilize first\)
- Database backup/export utilities
- Full database documentation

## Technical Highlights
- Python 3.11+ with modern type hints
- SQLAlchemy 2.x with Mapped[] annotations
- Pydantic v2 for configuration validation
- Black + isort for code formatting
- pytest + coverage for testing

## Next Phase
Phase 2 will focus on Data Infrastructure \(data models, providers,
storage, catalog, versioning\).

Contributors:
- Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
